item.title: Ashley add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Humor is reason gone mad." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "One morning I shot an elephant in my pajamas. How he got in my pajamas I'll never know." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "If you're not having fun, you're doing something wrong." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I, not events, have the power to make me happy or unhappy today. I can choose which it shall be. Yesterday is dead, tomorrow hasn't arrived yet. I have just one day, today, and I'm going to be happy in it." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Happiness is a warm puppy." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description:
"And on the subject of burning books: I want to congratulate librarians, not famous for their physical strength or their powerful political connections or their great wealth, who, all over this country, have staunchly resisted anti-democratic bullies who have tried to remove certain books from their shelves, and have refused to reveal to thought police the names of persons who have checked out those titles.
So the America I loved still exists, if not in the White House or the Supreme Court or the Senate or the House of Representatives or the media. The America I love still exists at the front desks of our public libraries." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "There is more treasure in books than in all the pirates' loot on Treasure Island and best of all, you can enjoy these riches every day of your life." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "Book collecting is an obsession, an occupation, a disease, an addiction, a fascination, an absurdity, a fate. It is not a hobby. Those who do it must do it. Those who do not do it, think of it as a cousin of stamp collecting, a sister of the trophy cabinet, bastard of a sound bank account and a weak mind." -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "I don't do drugs. I am drugs." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Salvador Dalí
item.description: "Each morning when I awake, I experience again a supreme pleasure: that of being Salvador Dali." -- Salvador Dalí

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "Take me, I am the drug; take me, I am hallucinogenic" -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Salvador Dalí
Ashley add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "Let my enemies devour each other" -- Salvador Dali
